item.title: Me 我
item.description: Who Am I 关于我 Hello world! Here is Allen Hu, a computer science student at UCSB. 我在江西长大，后迁至深圳，现居圣塔芭芭拉——一座僻静、安宁、如画的海滨小镇。 Reading 阅读 Reading is my biggest hobby. I believe that the god’s most precious gift to us is the ability to read and write. To be more specific, I like both ancient and modern Chinese literature. I enjoy reading classical Chinese. For genres, I like all novels, prose, travel notes, sketch, poems, etc. 阅读是最让我享受的事情之一，不过前提是静下心，安顿下来。 我是英文文盲，阅读一直局限在中文，无论古典文学还是当代文学，无论题材， 论语、史书、唐传奇、明清小说、散文、当代文学、台湾文学、现代诗、剧本，都浅尝过。 回顾过去，最喜欢的大约有几类:
